name: .VF File Extension
summary: Learn about .VF files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A VF file is a video-editing project created by the discontinued MAGIX VEGAS Movie Studio (formerly Sony Vegas Movie Studio). It contains project information, including the editing timeline, applied effects and transitions, and references to video and audio clips imported into the project. While MAGIX no longer develops VEGAS Movie Studio, its VEGAS Pro program still supports VF files.

content: Sony developed Vegas Movie Studio before MAGIX acquired it in 2016. MAGIX then rebranded it to VEGAS Movie Studio (also known as VEGAS Movie Studio+DVD), and its target audience was consumers looking to edit home videos and burn them to DVDs.

The VF format was the primary file type supported by VEGAS Movie Studio under Sony and MAGIX for saving projects before exporting them to other formats or burning them. However, MAGIX replaced the software with the entirely different MAGIX Movie Studio in 2021.

instructions: You can open VF files with MAGIX VEGAS Pro in Windows. For example, you can open a VF file by selecting File â†’ Open.
